title: Wixon's Day
description: He wanted to see the ruined world...Now he has to save it.Marquos travels Estalia's waterways with a secret. The girl hiding below deck was rescued from the mines. Can he get her home safely before disappearing into the North?She's opened his eyes to the true nature of Estalia's Guards. Kidnapping children is the least of their crimes.Â There's a secret war coming closer to home - and their terrible weapons point back to the time before the darkness. Are the rebels right to resist the only order left in the world?Marquos cannot run from the truth.It's a fight he must join, on one side or the other. But can he protect what's left of the world, or will he become instrumental in its destruction?You'll love this atmospheric post-apocalyptic adventure, because it's packed with colourful characters and action that'll keep you coming back for more.Get it now.
author: Phil    Williams
